name: Life After Magic (itch)
description:
Being an adult sucks! Life was so much easier when Akiko was saving the world with her magical girl squad, the Sentinels. Now she's stuck working a boring retail job, watching the days creep closer to Y2K. She’s lost touch with her high school friends, her powers, and herself. Where has the magic gone?

In development for SuNoFes 2022! Release date September 3, 2022

  • 62k+ words
  • 12 tracks of original music
  • Handmade pixel art & VFX
  • Sapphic main cast
  • Jaded 20-somethings
  • Y2K anxiety
  • A funky lil cat






  • Avalon Forest (itch) - Initial Concept, Writer, BG Artist
  • Brenna (ArchBrenemy) (itch) - Narrative Design, Writer
  • Ooyu (twitter) - Programmer, Writer, Social Media Manager
  • Lisa (midorifield) (twitter) - Character Designer, CG Artist, Writer

  • Meghan (itch) (twitter) – UI Designer
  • Evelyn (EveeNova) (twitter) – Character Sprites, Pixel Artist, Animator, Programmer
  • CooingCrow (twitter) - Writer
  • Natalie (ketchupkiddo) (twitter) – BG Artist, CG Artist
  • Marina (itch) - Programmer
  • Jenny Vi Pham (itch/twitter) - Co-writer
  • Charlotte Pang (twitter) - Proof reader
  • Eliana Zebro (twitter) - Sound Designer
